hero-title: Construction, customization and sale of packaging machines and materials.
hero-description: The quality of the service is the result of the maximum commitment that all the staff place on a daily basis, in order to always offer the best product and the utmost professionalism.
materials-description: Lots of materials ready for delivery and customizable on request
machines-description: Wide range of automatic / semiautomatic machines for every need
contact-us-description-p1: Simm Imballaggi is a company specialized in the construction, customization and sale of packaging machines and materials.
contact-us-description-p2: The treated products are selected on the basis of careful and continuous monitoring of the national and international market, with the aim of constantly improving quality and technology.
contact-us-description-p3: The quality of the service is the result of the maximum commitment that all the staff place on a daily basis, in order to always offer the best product and the utmost professionalism.
contact-us-description-p4: The customer is the main focus of the company. For every need, specific solutions are quickly identified that allow work to be improved, saving time, saving personnel, improving the image of the packaging, optimizing costs.
contact-us-button: Contact us now to receive information
address-link: Via Gian Luigi Lazzari 18, Quarto Inferiore (BO)
cookies: This site uses cookies to improve your experience.
name: Name
contact-us-caption: If you need more information, please fill out the following form. You will receive an answer as soon as possible.
